result.purpose: Handles HTTP requests related to Ethereum transactions and signatures in a web3 context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on handling specific web3 functionalities through separate files for decoding transactions and managing signatures.

internal/domains/web3/handlers/decode.go.purpose: Handles decoding of Ethereum transactions, calls, and logs via HTTP endpoints.

internal/domains/web3/handlers/signature.purpose: Handles HTTP requests related to signatures in a web3 context.
